E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are not happy that you let Wayne Tolleson go.
The overall fan interest decreases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Sunday, 4/23/1991
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Desi Relaford
Dear Sir,
Desi Relaford has an AVG of .188 at AA Tulsa Drillers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/8/1991
Subject: Status of Tim Naehring
Dear Sir,
Tim Naehring shouldn't play at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .242 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/19/1991
Subject: Status of John Roper
Dear Sir,
John Roper has problems at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an ERA of 9.13, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/28/1991
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Kent Hrbek



Date: Monday, 5/29/1991
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Mike Mason



Date: Tuesday, 5/30/1991
Subject: Status of Manny Alexander
Dear Sir,
Manny Alexander isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .246, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 6/2/1991
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Friday, 6/2/1991
Subject: Progress of Joe Grahe
Dear Sir,
Joe Grahe has nothing more to prove at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an ERA of 3.09 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/7/1991
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Bruce Hurst
